details: Dropped 'Company Size' column which is entirely NaN
Defined functions to extract language requirements, company info, soft skills, and data skills from the 'Description'
Dropped duplicate rows and reset index
Ensured all column names are unique
Applied extraction functions to 'Description' column to create new columns for 'Language Requirements', 'Company Info', 'Soft Skills', and 'Data Skills'
Dropped completely duplicate rows and reset index again after extraction
Saved the cleaned dataset to a new CSV file 'adzuna_data_cleaned.csv'
